Time Bokan Series: Bokan Densetsu: Buta Mo O Daterya Doronbo

name: Time Bokan Series: Bokan Densetsu - Buta mo Odaterya Doronboo
summary: Time Bokan Series: Bokan Densetsu - Buta mo Odaterya Doronboo is a Role-Playing game, developed by Alpha Unit and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000.
